description: A grand, high-ceilinged common room, likely within a magical castle, featuring ornate reddish-orange wall coverings with vine motifs, and numerous framed portraits. Sunlight streams through tall arched windows on the left and back, illuminating intricate patterns on large, dark red rugs and antique wooden furniture. Several individuals are present, some engaged in conversation at tables or seated in armchairs. In the foreground, a person in a dark and red academic robe stands with their back mostly to the camera, observing the room. A large wooden cabinet filled with artifacts is prominent on the far left wall, next to a tall stained-glass window.
pov: The camera is positioned behind and slightly to the left of the foreground character, offering a view of the room that focuses on the left-center. The grand cabinet and a stained-glass window are clearly visible on the far left, while the far right side of the room is mostly obscured.
